# -*- ck2.decisions -*-

################################################################################
# WARNING: Do NOT modify this file manually!
#
# This file is code-generated and any manual changes will be overwritten.
#
# Generated by src/religion_codegen.py
################################################################################
title_decisions = {
	secretly_convert_to_catholic_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = catholic }
			NOT = { religion = catholic }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			OR = {
				any_province = {
					religion = catholic
					is_heretic = no
				}
				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {
						religion = catholic
						is_heretic = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = catholic } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = catholic
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = catholic
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = catholic
			}
		}
	}

				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }

				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = monophysite } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = monophysite
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = monophysite
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = monophysite
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_apostolic_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = apostolic }
			NOT = { religion = apostolic }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			OR = {
				any_province = {
					religion = apostolic
					is_heretic = no
				}
				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {
						religion = apostolic
						is_heretic = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = apostolic } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = apostolic
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = apostolic
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = apostolic
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_paulician_holy_site = {
		filter = owned

		ai = no

		from_potential = {

					}

			}

			}

		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = zaydi }
			NOT = { religion = zaydi }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			OR = {
				any_province = {
					religion = zaydi
					is_heretic = no
				}
				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {
						religion = zaydi
						is_heretic = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = zaydi } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = zaydi
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = zaydi
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = zaydi
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_hurufi_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = hurufi }
			NOT = { religion = hurufi }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			OR = {
				any_province = {
					religion = hurufi
					is_heretic = no
				}
				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {
						religion = hurufi
						is_heretic = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = hurufi } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = hurufi
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = hurufi
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = hurufi
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_ismaili_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = ismaili }
			NOT = { religion = ismaili }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			OR = {
				any_province = {
					religion = ismaili
					is_heretic = no
				}
				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {
						religion = ismaili
						is_heretic = no
					}
				}
			}
		}

			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = ismaili } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = ismaili
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = ismaili
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = ismaili
			}
		}

				}

				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }

			}

				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = druze
			}
		}

		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

			is_incapable = no

			NOT = { religion = qarmatian }

				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {

						is_heretic = no
					}
				}

				}

			}

			}

		ai = no

		ai = no

			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = hellenic_pagan }

	secretly_convert_to_bon_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = bon }
			NOT = { religion = bon }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			OR = {
				any_province = {
					religion = bon
					is_heretic = no
				}
				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {
						religion = bon
						is_heretic = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = bon } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = bon
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = bon
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = bon
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_zoroastrian_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = zoroastrian }
			NOT = { religion = zoroastrian }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			OR = {
				any_province = {
					religion = zoroastrian
					is_heretic = no
				}
				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {
						religion = zoroastrian
						is_heretic = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = zoroastrian } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = zoroastrian
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = zoroastrian
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = zoroastrian
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_mazdaki_holy_site = {
		filter = owned

		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = mazdaki }
			NOT = { religion = mazdaki }

				any_province = {
					religion = mazdaki
					is_heretic = no
				}
				any_independent_ruler = {
					any_realm_lord = {
						religion = mazdaki
						is_heretic = no
					}
				}
			}

				}

				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}

				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = mazdaki
			}
		}

			}
		}

			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = taoist
			}
		}
	}
}
